Command Stick™ is designed for speed, ease of use and universal functionality. Execute commands by dragging through the circle’s regions in order.

Navigating to a menu item becomes a single gesture. The real value comes with repetition – users go from navigating a menu to inadvertently learning a gesture. There is no limit on how fast gestures can be performed.

How it works:
1: Summon CS using ctrl+right click or by double right clicking
2: Drag around the circle to select a menu item
3: Release to execute the command 
4: The space is reused allowing multiple commands to fit within the small footprint
**Important** : Extensions cannot run on internal chrome pages such as new tab.

Command Stick offers rapid access to:
→ dial scrolling
  dial zooming
  scroll to top
  scroll to bottom
  new tab, close tab
  toggle full screen
  refresh page
  zoom reset
  copy, paste, cut
  delete, undo, redo
  share (Twitter)
  select all, unselect all
  audio accessibility assistance
  navigation on select webpages 
  and more!

By default CS summons on second right click – this will display the context menu on initial right click and CS on the second. To swap CS to primary right click, toggle the option in the context menu.

We are currently developing the framework for users to configure custom commands – watch this space! 

Please note:
Our service is free, no paid edition & no advertisements. Command Stick™ is fully patented. 

Command Stick does not work on Chrome's built-in pages e.g. new tab, because of 
Google's security restrictions.

For new feature announcements or just to say hello, follow @CommandStick
